creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: plaid; two panels joined with red stitches; four selvedges; red background with green, blue fine lines, vertical and horizontal; supplementary weft pattern with rows of birds and other zoomorphic figures in blue, yellow, green, pink, white, purple and pink; stylized floral motifs and geometric patterning at both borders
title: Cloth (tzute)
